Symptoms GAD situational nature . Females childbearing potential ( surgically sterilize menarche 1 year postmenopause ) breastfeeding ; test negative pregnancy time enrollment base urine pregnancy test ; agree use reliable method birth control study 1 week follow last dose study drug . Must Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) anxiety subscale score great equal 10 Visit 1 . Any current primary DSMIV Axis I diagnosis GAD .
